deposit(address).details: Stores the sent amount as credit to be withdrawn.

params.payee: The destination address of the funds.

transferPrimary(address).details: Transfers contract to a new primary.

withdrawWithGas(address).details: Same as {withdraw}, but forwarding all gas to the recipient.     * WARNING: Forwarding all gas opens the door to reentrancy vulnerabilities. Make sure you trust the recipient, or are either following the checks-effects-interactions pattern or using {ReentrancyGuard}.     * _Available since v2.4.0._
